message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with a task of answering a series of inter-dependent questions given an input image, which involves resolving visual references among the questions. This problem is related to computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP), which suggests that the paper could belong to cs.CV and cs.CL sub-categories. Moreover, the proposed model uses an attention mechanism to exploit visual attentions in the past, which is a common technique in deep learning (DL) and artificial intelligence (AI) research. Therefore, cs.AI and cs.LG are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper evaluates its model on a new synthetic visual dialog dataset, which involves information retrieval (IR) and knowledge representation (KR) aspects. Hence, cs.IR is another possible sub-category.
